pullRequest.title: [RW-5503][risk=no] Cleanup for Cohort Builder V2 UI
pullRequest.bodyText:
Cleanup of code and updating the styles to more closely match mocks. Changes include:
Give sidebar more width for criteria selections/fix styles for selection list

Update placement of external links and help text in list search view

Update age slider layout/allow for multiple age range selections


PR checklist

 This PR meets the Acceptance Criteria in the JIRA story
 The JIRA story has been moved to Dev Review
 I have run and tested this change locally
 If this includes a UI change, I have taken screen recordings or screenshots of the new behavior and notified the PO and UX designer

beforeCommit.message: RW-5503 update styles and clean up demographics
